DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 , open-label , single arm trial pamrevlumab ( FG-3019 ) estimate pamrevlumab 's safety efficacy non-ambulatory subject DMD .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Pamrevlumab ( FG-3019 ) , Non-Ambulatory Subjects With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy ( DMD )
DOC.detailed_description: Each subject receive pamrevlumab ( 35 mg/kg ) every two week intravenous infusion least one year . Subjects may continue study additional 6 month ( total year half ) pulmonary function test show stabilization improvement first 52 week treatment FibroGen Medical Monitor approve continue . All subject closely monitor safety . Efficacy assessment perform routinely course study .
